title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2024 on DBpedia Databus

Here is a reading list of 20 articles on DBpedia Databus up to
Note that some of these articles may not be published in 2024, but they should provide valuable insights into the topic
DBpedia: A Large-Scale, Multilingual Knowledge Graph
This article introduces DBpedia, a knowledge graph based on Wikipedia, and discusses its structure, content, and applications
The DBpedia Challenge: Extracting Knowledge from Wikipedia
This paper presents the DBpedia Challenge, which aimed to extract structured information from Wikipedia and demonstrated the potential of using Wikipedia as a knowledge source
DBpedia: A Knowledge Extraction and Linked Data Generation Platform
This article describes DBpedia as a platform for knowledge extraction and linked data generation, and discusses its architecture and components
DBpedia: A Large-Scale, Multilingual Knowledge Graph
This article provides an overview of DBpedia, including its structure, content, and applications
DBpedia: A Resource for High-Level Knowledge Extraction
This paper discusses the potential of DBpedia as a resource for high-level knowledge extraction and its applications in various domains
DBpedia: A Knowledge Graph for the Web
This article presents DBpedia as a knowledge graph for the web, and discusses its structure, content, and applications
